ucl.cs.cw3.bigramindex
Class BigramIndexReducer

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Reducer<PairOfStrings,PairOfStringInt,PairOfStrings,InvertedIndex>
      ucl.cs.cw3.bigramindex.BigramIndexReducer

public class BigramIndexReducer
extends org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Reducer<PairOfStrings,PairOfStringInt,PairOfStrings,InvertedIndex>

Author:
Tianyi Xiong This is the reducer used for building bigram inverted index. For each bigram , emit(bigram, invertedindex) and the List of (docid,tf) is sorted. The count of bigram which start with word w is stored in an temporary folder in order to calculate probability of each bigram in anther MapReduce job.
